original_text: Then the rulers of the towns on the coast of the sea will be very sad. They will no longer sit on their thrones. They will remove their beautiful royal clothes. They will sit on the ground as they shake with fear. They will not stop shaking when they hear what has happened to you.
korean_text: 그 때에 바다의 모든 왕이 그 보좌에서 내려 조복을 벗으며 수 놓은 옷을 버리고 떨림을 입듯 하고 땅에 앉아서 너로 말미암아 무시로 떨며 놀랄 것이며

sentences.original_text: Then the rulers of the towns on the coast of the sea
They will no longer sit on their thrones
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 그들의 옥좌에 앉지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will remove their beautiful royal clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아름다운 왕실 옷을 벗을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will sit on the ground
when they hear what has happened to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지 들을 때
